oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studies on the effects of various design and operational parameters on solid circulation rate in a recirculating fluidized-bed
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ALAPPAT, BJ
RANE, VC
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fluidized bed
recirculating fluidized bed
draft tube
solid circulation rate
draft tube
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Effects of various operational parameters, such as draft tube superficial air velocity and solid inventory and design parameters such as jet diameter and clearance between perforated plate and draft tube bottom on the solid circulation rate of a recirculating fluidized bed are studied. A simple butterfly valve arrangement was used for the direct measurement of the solid circulation rate.
